definition[0]: (1983-) an English pop singer who is a member of the girl group Girls Aloud. She has also had success as a solo singer. Her songs include Fight for This Love (2009) and Promise This (2010). In 2008 she became a judge on The X Factor, a singing competition broadcast on television. She is known for having an attractive appearance, wearing fashionable clothes, and for her Geordie  (=from Newcastle) accent. The media sometimes describe her as the ‘nation’s sweetheart’. She used to be married to Ashley Cole, an English football player.
